chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: 
The device has a battery capacity of 85% in excellent condition... within a month it's under 85 and the device is worthless... 

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

the customer sent his device back to you, for a repair/exchange of the battery.
He received the device with a battery capacity of 83%.

Please keep us informed.

Kind Regards,
Derya from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
AS
